segments.text: So Kim , have you ever had anything stolen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My uncle just had his motorcycle stolen a few nights ago . I was just thinking about how clever criminals are these days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Criminals are clever ? They're only successful when people are careless .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . The ones who stole my uncle's motorcycle were pretty good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If your uncle had an alarm system , then it wouldn't have happened .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He did . It was one of the best ones available . But that didn't stop them from disabling 11 it . And on a crowded street too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You would think that people would be smart enough to stop something like that . No one knew his motorcycle was being stolen . The thieves came in a truck and convinced everybody that my uncle was parked illegally and they were there to tow it away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , they were good . I guess criminals aren't that dumb after all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's not the end . They were so good that they convinced a bystander to help them lift the motorcycle and put it in the truck .
segments.speaker: S1
